full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, HA GCIG GIS 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BZLOG @004B BSGYUR ZER BA DE LA CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA MING BTANG NAS TSIG MI MTHUN PA'I GCIG BYAS LA MDO YOD PA DANG, CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR YIG RNYING MA RNYED PA DANG, SNGA MO NAS DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL ZHING, ,SLAR YANG SMAN PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG GI RIM 'GRO DGOS PA CHE ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR MCHOG PAR, RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA PHAN PA AE SRID SNYAM PAS SLOB GNYER MA BYAS PA'I BLUN PO SNYING KHAMS CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYIS GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,)
